column1: # This file documents all balance values for easy tuning.
# Changes here should be reflected in the corresponding Kotlin files.
# Gold rewards increased 20-30% from original for better economy flow
# 1. Players should be able to place 2-3 towers before Wave 1
# 2. Economy should feel tight but not punishing on Normal
# 3. Boss kills should feel very rewarding (750g = 3-4 tower placements)
# 4. Late-game should require optimal tower placement and upgrades
# 5. No level should be impossible - all should be beatable with skill
# - If too easy: Reduce starting gold or increase difficulty_mult
# - If too hard: Increase enemy gold rewards or starting gold
# - If economy too slow: Increase wave bonus gold
# - If economy too fast: Reduce kill rewards
